name: Petz Hamsterz Superstars
overview: Players can make their hamsters into the stars they’ve always wanted them to be: Care for them, discover their personality and train them in a variety of fun and wacky activities to turn them into talented Petz. Players can also send their animals to and from these Petz games via wireless inter-connectivity. Send your baby pet from Petz Nursery to Dogz Talent Show or Hamsterz Superstarz to continue to watch them grow and train them to become talented starz! Or breed a talented baby puppy in Petz Dogz Talent Show and send him to Petz Nursery to nurture him. Features • Care for your hamsters and discover their talents: care for your hamsters and train them . • Unlock new items: As you train your hamster, earn coins that you can spend at the store to unlock new toys and accessories. • Train your hamsters in wacky activities and watch them progress through different levels: including parachuting, bowling contests, and running through mazes. • Discover your hamsters’ funny and unexpected behaviors: Watch their funny facial expressions and animations.
